name: Linear/Exponential
description:
This algorithm implements a linear-to-exponential converter and an exponential-to-linear converter,
typically used when interfacing between Volt/octave and Hz/Volt CV standards.

The 0V point for the V/octave signals is taken as C3 (130.8Hz approximately).

input_ports.name: Input (Linear/HzV)
input_ports.description: The input bus for linear Hz/V signals.

input_ports.name: Input (Exponential/V/Octave)
input_ports.description: The input bus for exponential V/octave signals.

output_ports.name: Output (Exponential/V/Octave)
output_ports.description: The output bus for converted exponential V/octave signals.

output_ports.name: Output (Linear/HzV)
output_ports.description: The output bus for converted linear Hz/V signals.
